about_the_game:
You don't know how you got here.

You don't know why you are here.

All you know is you have to flush 8 toilets to escape... Don't question it...

But something else is in the Maze with you...

This DLC will include an entirely new game inside Toilet Flushing Simulator!
Navigate through a confusing labyrinth to find and flush 8 toilets, all while being hunted by whatever else is in the maze with you.
But flushing all the toilets isn't enough to beat this, you will have to find your way to the exit which will only open after all the toilets are flushed.
The DLC can be accessed from the main menu by going to the new extras tab which is found at the bottom of the menu, the log has been moved in there too.

But flushing all the toilets isn't enough to beat this, you will have to find your way to the exit which will only open after all the toilets are flushed.
The DLC can be accessed from the main menu by going to the new extras tab which is found at the bottom of the menu, the log has been moved in there too.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Fedora 34 (Workstation Edition) 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz x 12
  • Memory: 15 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NV167 / Mesa Intel UHD Graphics (CML GT2)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14.6+
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 1536 MB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

short_description: Escape the maze by flushing 8 toilets hidden around to unlock the exit. However, something is hunting you throughout the maze. Don't get caught!
